name: brain-puzzle-game
description: Brain Puzzle: Tricky Quest Clone - A creative puzzle game

scripts.build:mobile: next build && npx cap copy android
scripts.build:mobile:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap copy android && npx cap open android
scripts.build:apk: npm run build:mobile && npx cap build android
scripts.build:release: npm run build:mobile && npx cap build android --prod
scripts.build:release:apk: npm run build:mobile && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:release:bundle: npm run build:mobile && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.build:cordova: npm run export && cp -r out/* cordova/www/ && cp public/cordova-init.js cordova/www/ && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.build:cordova:release: npm run export && cp -r out/* cordova/www/ && cp public/cordova-init.js cordova/www/ && cd cordova && cordova build android --release
scripts.build:cordova:debug: npm run export && cp -r out/* cordova/www/ && cp public/cordova-init.js cordova/www/ && cd cordova && cordova run android
